SEARCH
Package model.hotel.room

Class Room

java.lang.Object
model.hotel.room.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeluxeRoom, ExecutiveRoom, StandardRoom
public abstract class Room extends Object
Represents a room of a hotel. Serves as a template for the different types of rooms.

    • computeReservedDates

      public int computeReservedDates()
      Computes the number of dates the Room instance is reserved for.
      Returns:
      the total number of reserved dates.

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(int date)
      Checks if the Room instance is available on a particular date.
      Parameters:
      date - the given date to check the room for.
      Returns:
      true if it is available on the given date, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is not within the range of 1 to 31.

    • addReservedDates

      public void addReservedDates(Reservation reserve)
      Adds/records dates in the room's records for reservation.
      Parameters:
      reserve - the given Reservation to be added.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the reservation is null.

    • removeReservedDates

      public void removeReservedDates(Reservation reserve)
      Removes recorded dates in the room's records for reservation.
      Parameters:
      reserve - the given Reservation to be removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the reservation is null.
